cards.heading: SQA Engineer
cards.text: A Software Quality Assurance (SQA) Engineer, also known as a Software Tester or Quality Assurance Engineer, is a professional responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of software applications or systems.

cards.heading: PHP Developer
cards.text: As a PHP developer, you specialize in using the PHP programming language to build web applications and websites. PHP is a widely used and popular server-side scripting language, particularly suited for web development.

cards.heading: React Developer
cards.text: As a React developer, you'll be working with components, managing state and props, and handling events to create interactive and dynamic web applications.

cards.heading: Node.Js Developer
cards.text: As a Node.js developer, work with JavaScript on the server side to build scalable and efficient web applications. Node.js is a runtime environment that allows you to run JavaScript code outside of a web browser, making it ideal for server-side

cards.heading: Laravel Developer
